original_title: Large crowds at Anuradhapura NPP rally
original_body_lines: Thousands of supporters gathered for the National People’s Power May Day rally held at the Salgado Grounds in Anuradhapura this afternoon. The NPP procession, which commenced from the Walisinghe Harishchandra Ground, Anuradhapura proceeded to the Salgado Ground where the rally was held. Pix by B.G. Chathuranga
